definition: to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of KeAn buccal tablets in treating childrens MP pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察咳安含片治疗小儿支原体肺炎的临床作用。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the best extracting process of Zhenyin buccal tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察贞银口含片的最佳水提工艺。

sentences.english: Chew the gum slowly until it tingles.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢咀嚼尼古丁含片，直到感觉发麻。

sentences.english: Objective To study the water extracting technical condition of Juhuang Shangqing Buccal Tablet.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选菊黄上清含片的水煎煮提取工艺条件。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a HPLC method for the determination of galuteolin in Qingyan buccal tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立清咽含片中木犀草苷含量的测定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the formulation of Kudingcha tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的确定苦丁茶含片的工艺条件。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To optimize the water-extraction process for Yanyan buccal tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选咽炎口含片的提取工艺条件。

sentences.english: I ran out to buy you some fruit and honeysuckle tablet.
sentences.chinese: 我休息了一天就跑出去给你买水果和金银花含片。

sentences.english: The headdress, high and square, is decorated with lozenges .
sentences.chinese: 该头饰，高度和面积，装饰有含片。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a HPLC method for the determination of tinidazole buccal tabs.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立替硝唑含片含量的高效液相色谱法测定法。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish an method for determination of Yinhuang buccal tablet.
sentences.chinese: 目的为银黄含片建立含量测定方法。

sentences.english: To produce a kind of Baishouwu healthy buccal tablet which could improve ammunition.
sentences.chinese: 研制了具有增强免疫力等保健功能的白首乌含片。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pharmacodynamics and toxicology of Watermelon Frost Throat-Clearing Buccal Tablets(WFTBT).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察西瓜霜清咽含片的药理作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of Qingyankaiwei tablets on moisturizing intestine and relaxing the bowels.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察清咽开胃含片的润肠通便作用。

sentences.english: How do It take the sucking lozenges?
Objective:To study the analgesic effect of qingyan buccal tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察清咽开胃含片的润肠通便作用。

definition: medicine to be taken after being mixed with water (or other liquid)
antipyretic tablet (to reduce fever), such as sulfanilamide
Sichuan fritillary bulb (Bulbus fritillariae cirrhosae, used in TCM)
